summary.value: Principal Product Manager focusing on eCommerce, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Media and UGC Products. Led cross-functional teams of data scientists, engineers, and designers. Currently leading AI model training and knowledge graphs, orchestrating workloads with Containers and HPC services at Amazon.

career_lite.headline: Principal Product Manager at Amazon - AI Forecasting, Logistics | YouTube Creator (65k+ subscribers) | Context Architecture Consultant

experience.title: Principal Product Manager
experience.description: Oversees 'Expected Costs' forecasting product for Middle Mile logistics. Manages five AI models delivering $55 million in validated savings. Specializes in AI/ML deployment, forecast accuracy (MAPE), and transformers implementation.

experience.title: Context Architecture Consultant
experience.description: Building Context Architecture as scalable business - positioning as 'Wix for custom AIs' helping individuals and small businesses create structured personal knowledge systems.

CJ and Tiffany first met in August 2009 while pursuing their MBA at Clark Atlanta University.
CJ rerouted his trip so he could join Tiffany, Ty, and others for the celebration at the Ritz-Carlton in Krabi
CJ showed up to the wedding wearing Adidas sweatpants and a fitted Adidas long sleeve shirt
Tiffany is part of an Afrotech investment group chat with CJ
CJ showed up to the wedding wearing Adidas sweatpants and a fitted Adidas long sleeve shirt — pure athletic wear — while everyone else was dressed in full formal attire
Dre is part of CJ's Groomsmen Circle — the most emotionally trusted and battle-tested brotherhood
Central narrator and anchor for all Markham-era relationships.
Core childhood neighborhood on 165th & Marshfield in Markham, Illinois from 1983 to 2001
Backyard served as primary basketball court and social hub for neighborhood kids.
CJ Mitchell is building 'The Context Journey' - a comprehensive digital continuation system designed to preserve his thinking, values, and voice for his son London.
CJ operates as a Principal Product Manager at Amazon in AI Forecasting and Logistics, managing five AI models that have delivered $55 million in validated savings.
He runs the 'Putchuon' YouTube channel (65k+ subscribers) focused on AI education
His ENTP personality drives systematic documentation of personal knowledge, relationships, and decision-making frameworks
